categories: Category:Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Republic Commando voice actors

nodes.text: Kevin Schmitt is an employee for LucasArts. He was the Lead Level Designer for Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith and Star Wars: Republic Commando. He also voiced TK8252 in the former.
He is friends with Ryan Kaufman, who named Gavin Zmitt after him.
